content: **description ** this crocheted bow scrunchie is a quick and easy project perfect for beginners made with vibrant multicolor yarn in fresh spring hues it adds a cheerful touch to any hairstyle the simple stitches make it fast to create and the delicate bow detail enhances its charm perfect as a stylish accessory or a thoughtful handmade gift **level ** easy **yarns ** - brand royal batik zeeman - material 100% polyacryl - skein weight 100 grams - - skein length +/- 241 meters - quantity 1 skein multicolored **tools ** - crochet hook 5 mm - tapestry needle - hair tie
